verses.verse: And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>, in the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> year <S%H8141><s%> after they were come out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8800><s%> of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,
Let the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> also keep <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> at his appointed season <S%H4150><s%>.

In the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of this month <S%H2320><s%>, at even <S%H6153><s%>, ye shall keep <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it in his appointed season <S%H4150><s%>: according to all the rites <S%H2708><s%> of it, and according to all the ceremonies <S%H4941><s%> thereof, shall ye keep <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it.
And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, that they should keep <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%>.

And they kept <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> on the fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the first <S%H7223><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> of Sinai <S%H5514><s%>: according to all that the YY <S%H3068><s%> commanded <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, so did <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>.

And there were certain men <S%H582><s%>, who were defiled <S%H2931><s%> by the dead body <S%H5315><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%>, that they could <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not keep <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> on that day <S%H3117><s%>: and they came <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8799><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> and before <S%H6440><s%> Aharon <S%H175><s%> on that day <S%H3117><s%>:

And those <S%H1992><s%> men <S%H582><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, We are defiled <S%H2931><s%> by the dead body <S%H5315><s%> of a man <S%H120><s%>: wherefore are we kept back <S%H1639><s%> <S%H8735><s%>, that we may not offer <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8687><s%> an offering <S%H7133><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> in his appointed season <S%H4150><s%> among <S%H8432><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> ?

And Mosheh <S%H4872><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Stand still <S%H5975><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and I will hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> what the YY <S%H3068><s%> will command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> concerning you.
And the YY <S%H3068><s%> spake <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8762><s%> unto Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>,

Speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8761><s%> unto the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, If any <S%H376><s%> man <S%H376><s%> of you or of your posterity <S%H1755><s%> shall be unclean <S%H2931><s%> by reason of a dead body <S%H5315><s%>, or be in a journey <S%H1870><s%> afar off <S%H7350><s%>, yet he shall keep <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>.

The fourteenth <S%H702><s%> <S%H6240><s%> day <S%H3117><s%> of the second <S%H8145><s%> month <S%H2320><s%> at even <S%H6153><s%> they shall keep <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it, and eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it with matzah <S%H4682><s%> and bitter <S%H4844><s%> herbs.

They shall leave <S%H7604><s%> <S%H8686><s%> none of it unto the morning <S%H1242><s%>, nor break <S%H7665><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any bone <S%H6106><s%> of it: according to all the ordinances <S%H2708><s%> of the passover <S%H6453><s%> they shall keep <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it.

But the man <S%H376><s%> that is clean <S%H2889><s%>, and is not in a journey <S%H1870><s%>, and forbeareth <S%H2308><s%> <S%H8804><s%> to keep <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%>, even the same soul <S%H5315><s%> shall be cut off <S%H3772><s%> <S%H8738><s%> from among his people <S%H5971><s%>: because he brought <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8689><s%> not the offering <S%H7133><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> in his appointed season <S%H4150><s%>, that man <S%H376><s%> shall bear <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his sin <S%H2399><s%>.

And if a stranger <S%H1616><s%> shall sojourn <S%H1481><s%> <S%H8799><s%> among you, and will keep <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the passover <S%H6453><s%> unto the YY <S%H3068><s%>; according to the ordinance <S%H2708><s%> of the passover <S%H6453><s%>, and according to the manner <S%H4941><s%> thereof, so shall he do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: ye shall have one <S%H259><s%> ordinance <S%H2708><s%>, both for the stranger <S%H1616><s%>, and for him that was born <S%H249><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%>.

And on the day <S%H3117><s%> that the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> was reared up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8687><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, namely, the tent <S%H168><s%> of the testimony <S%H5715><s%>: and at even <S%H6153><s%> there was upon the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> as it were the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%>, until the morning <S%H1242><s%>.
So it was alway <S%H8548><s%>: the cloud <S%H6051><s%> covered <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8762><s%> it by day, and the appearance <S%H4758><s%> of fire <S%H784><s%> by night <S%H3915><s%>.

And when <S%H6310><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8736><s%> from the tabernacle <S%H168><s%>, then after <S%H310><s%> that the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: and in the place <S%H4725><s%> where the cloud <S%H6051><s%> abode <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, there the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> pitched their tents <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

At the Mitzvah <S%H6310><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> journeyed <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and at the Mitzvah <S%H6310><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> they pitched <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: as long as <S%H3117><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> abode <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8799><s%> upon the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> they rested <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in their tents.

And when the cloud <S%H6051><s%> tarried long <S%H748><s%> <S%H8687><s%> upon the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>, then the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> kept <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, and journeyed <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not.

And so it was <S%H3426><s%>, when the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was a few <S%H4557><s%> days <S%H3117><s%> upon the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>; according to the Mitzvah <S%H6310><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> they abode <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in their tents, and according to the Mitzvah <S%H6310><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

And so it was <S%H3426><s%>, when the cloud <S%H6051><s%> abode from even <S%H6153><s%> unto the morning <S%H1242><s%>, and that the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8738><s%> in the morning <S%H1242><s%>, then they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: whether it was by day <S%H3119><s%> or by night <S%H3915><s%> that the cloud <S%H6051><s%> was taken up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8738><s%>, they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8804><s%>.

Or whether it were two days <S%H3117><s%>, or a month <S%H2320><s%>, or a year <S%H3117><s%>, that the cloud <S%H6051><s%> tarried <S%H748><s%> <S%H8687><s%> upon the tabernacle <S%H4908><s%>, remaining <S%H7931><s%> <S%H8800><s%> thereon, the children <S%H1121><s%> of Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> abode <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in their tents, and journeyed <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not: but when it was taken up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8736><s%>, they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

At the Mitzvah <S%H6310><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> they rested <S%H2583><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the tents, and at the Mitzvah <S%H6310><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> they journeyed <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8799><s%>: they kept <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the charge <S%H4931><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%>, at the Mitzvah <S%H6310><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> by the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Mosheh <S%H4872><s%>.
